ISSUE.TITLE: Drone doesn't work with Gitlab 7.9+
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: As @kowalczykp and others have noted on Gitter, Drone does not appear to work with the latest versions of Gitlab. Drone will issue a 400 Bad Request for all incoming webhooks. Manually verified with tcpflow on ubuntu. `tcpflow -p -c -i eth0 port 80` Seems to stem from the gitlab go library. https://github.com/Bugagazavr/go-gitlab-client/blob/master/hook_payload.go#L93 Indirectly the message reads. _"Invalid hook received, payload format not recognized."_
